docs.abstract: Executives are permitted to disclose market-moving information on social media. But Mr. Musk has provided regulators ample opportunity to re-examine the policy.
docs.snippet: Executives are permitted to disclose market-moving information on social media. But Mr. Musk has provided regulators ample opportunity to re-examine the policy.
docs.lead_paragraph: Why do people say the craziest things on Twitter?

headline.main: Elon Musk’s Tweets on Tesla Started a Tizzy. Someone Should Hit the Brakes.
headline.print_headline: Musk’s Mess Makes Case To Rethink Twitter Rule

docs.abstract: The article by Nathaniel Rich, published in The New York Times Magazine this month, detailed how a group of scientists, activists and politicians tried to stop climate change.
docs.snippet: The article by Nathaniel Rich, published in The New York Times Magazine this month, detailed how a group of scientists, activists and politicians tried to stop climate change.
docs.lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — A recent New York Times Magazine article about climate change and the political forces that have stymied efforts to combat the phenomenon will become an Apple television project.

headline.main: Apple Buys Rights to Series Based on New York Times Climate Change Article
headline.print_headline: Apple Buys TV Rights To Article On Climate

docs.abstract: By one measure, stocks crossed a major threshold on Wednesday. But the financial gains of the nearly decade-long run have been concentrated among the already wealthy.
docs.snippet: By one measure, stocks crossed a major threshold on Wednesday. But the financial gains of the nearly decade-long run have been concentrated among the already wealthy.
docs.lead_paragraph: The party has been going for nearly a decade. But a lot of Americans haven’t been celebrating.

headline.main: Bull Market Hits a Milestone: 3,453 Days. Most Americans Aren’t at the Party.
headline.print_headline: Bull Market Hits 3,453 Days; Gusher Flows Past Most Americans

docs.abstract: The new $1,000 device is aimed at power users who work, play, consume and create on their phone. For others, there are plenty of cheaper options.
docs.snippet: The new $1,000 device is aimed at power users who work, play, consume and create on their phone. For others, there are plenty of cheaper options.
docs.lead_paragraph: Apple’s iPhone X broke the pricing barrier for smartphones with a $1,000 price tag. Now Samsung’s new Galaxy Note device, which will be released this week, is joining the $1,000 Phone Club.

headline.main: Samsung’s Galaxy Note9: Too Much Phone for Most of Us
headline.print_headline: Samsung’s New Galaxy Note9: A Lot of Phone. Maybe Too Much.

docs.abstract: IGTV, the company’s new venture, allows longer videos, but your clips need to meet a few requirements.
docs.snippet: IGTV, the company’s new venture, allows longer videos, but your clips need to meet a few requirements.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. What is the difference between posting a video to Instagram and to IGTV?

headline.main: Going Vertical for Instagram’s New Video App

docs.abstract: Just like Windows users, Mac owners have ways to share and control another computer over the internet to give a quick assist online.
docs.snippet: Just like Windows users, Mac owners have ways to share and control another computer over the internet to give a quick assist online.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. If Windows comes with tools to help someone take control and troubleshoot another PC over the internet, what does Apple provide for long-distance Mac-to-Mac support?

headline.main: Help a Fellow Mac User With Remote Tech Support

docs.abstract: Timothy D. Cook of Apple, Ginni Rometty of IBM and dozens of other C.E.O.s said new guidelines and practices were hindering skilled foreign workers and harmful to economic growth.
docs.snippet: Timothy D. Cook of Apple, Ginni Rometty of IBM and dozens of other C.E.O.s said new guidelines and practices were hindering skilled foreign workers and harmful to economic growth.
docs.lead_paragraph: Dozens of American business leaders are challenging the Trump administration over changes to immigration policy that they say threaten the livelihoods of thousands of their skilled foreign workers, and the nation’s economic growth and competitiveness as well.

headline.main: Top C.E.O.s Denounce Trump Immigration Policy as Threat to U.S. Economy
headline.print_headline: Business Leaders View Immigration Policy as Threat to Economy

docs.abstract: Rather than burden his parents with the expense of his treatment, Tang Gongwei chose to disappear.
docs.snippet: Rather than burden his parents with the expense of his treatment, Tang Gongwei chose to disappear.
docs.lead_paragraph: ZHANGJIAJIE, China — Tang Chunwu set off from his room in a ramshackle inn just after sunrise, the beginning of Day 92 in his search for his son.

headline.main: A Chinese Pharmacist Found Out He Had Cancer. Then He Vanished.
headline.print_headline: A Diagnosis, Then a Painful Choice

byline.original: By Sui-Lee Wee and Elsie Chen

docs.abstract: By the time its finale airs in May, “The Big Bang Theory” will be the longest-running multicamera comedy in TV history.
docs.snippet: By the time its finale airs in May, “The Big Bang Theory” will be the longest-running multicamera comedy in TV history.
docs.lead_paragraph: “The Big Bang Theory,” CBS’s enormously successful sitcom, will finish its 12-season run in May, Warner Bros. announced on Wednesday.

headline.main: ‘The Big Bang Theory,’ a Durable Hit for CBS, Will End in 2019
headline.print_headline: ‘The Big Bang Theory’ Will End Next Year

docs.abstract: Teenagers can benefit from tax-free growth of investments in a Roth account years before they have the opportunity to contribute to a workplace retirement plan.
docs.snippet: Teenagers can benefit from tax-free growth of investments in a Roth account years before they have the opportunity to contribute to a workplace retirement plan.
docs.lead_paragraph: It might seem odd to open a retirement account for a high school student. But teenagers can get a big head start on long-term savings, financial advisers say, by stashing some of their earnings in a Roth individual retirement account.

headline.main: Retirement Planning in High School? It’s Never Too Early, Experts Say
headline.print_headline: Retirement Planning in High School? It’s Never Too Early
